    Reference

    All functions

    corrMap()

    Correlation based mapping

    getMappingResults(<mappingClass>,<logical>)

    Get cell type annotations

    getMappingResults(<mappingClass>,<missing>)

    Get cell type annotations

    getMappingResults()

    Get cell type annotations

    get_cl_medians()

    Compute cluster medians for each row in a matrix

    get_hierarchical_extended_results()

    This function returns names and bootstrap probabilities from all top mapped cell sets

    hierarchicalMapMyCells()

    This function maps query data against the AIT (Shiny) reference taxonomy using hierarchical mapping.

    list_mapmycells_params()

    Lists all the function parameters and their descriptions.

    map_by_cor()

    Map samples to a training dataset by correlation

    map_dend()

    Tree-based mapping

    mappingClass-class

    mappingClass S4 class definition

    mappingClass()

    Constructor function for mappingClass S4 class

    mappingMode()

    Function to set mapping mode

    resolve_cl()

    Tree-based mapping (internal)

    rfTreeMapping()

    Tree-based mapping

    seuratMap()

    Seurat based mapping

    subsampleCells()

    Function to subsample cells

    taxonomy_mapping()

    Cell type annotation and initial QC

    top_binary_genes()

    Get top genes by beta (binary) score

    treeMap()

    Tree based mapping
